summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3372, for the improvement of Earl Avenue Northwest, from West 73rd Street to the north line of Loyal Heights Addition, Division No. 6, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41734 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
